ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 96
ygData.msgSnippet: the thing is you re not giving us any information. you re just telling us that you have it and that doesn t help us at all. why don t you tell us what your
ygData.messageBody:
the thing is you're not giving us any information. you're just telling us
that you have it and that doesn't help us at all. why don't you tell us what
your idea is and some of us will look while you level. if it doesn't work
out that's fine, there have been lots of ideas here that haven't worked out.
but by continuously telling us that you have info, even though you're
appologizing, is like walking up to someone and repeatedly kicking them in
the shin and saying "I'm sorry I'm kicking you in the shin, I promise I'll
stop soon and when I do we'll both be better off, trust me"

Fixer, gnomish enchanter, Cazic-Thule

> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
> Why do you all act like this? I try to help, but you decline it. If what
you
> want is for me to truly leave with my information, then that is what I
will
> do. I will leave the choice up to you. I'm trying to apologize by helping,
> but you seem to want to be stubborn, and keep insulting me, saying all I'm
> out here to do is brag, when in fact I'm trying to do the opposite. What I
> have to do could easily be done by a level 1 shaman barbarian. I just want
> to check it out for myself first and return with a report, if you all hate
> me so much that you wouldn't even take direct information from me because
> you think I want to just brag about it, then I wil quietly leave you all
> with out another letter. But like I said, it's yur choice, you can accept
it
> or decline it.
>
